name: collections_metadata_subjects_relationships
description:
#### Permissions
This is public for a logged out user when an entity is public.
#### Returns
Returns a JSON object containing `data` and `links` keys.

The `data` key contains an array of nodes ids.
The `links` key contains a dictionary of links that can be used for [pagination](#tag/Pagination).

collection_id.description: A short id for that collection

cgm_id.description: A short id for that piece of metadata
